name: CrosBrawl Arena (mac download)
description:
Welcome to CrosBrawl Arena, the fighting game based on a real group of people. Each fighter has a unique move set based off of their interests and hobbies. The first wave of fighters are as follows; Kaden: the well rounded "default", Nolan: the defensive and forceful fighter, Casey: the guitar-wielding swift fighter, Yash: the glass cannon who uses technology to his advantage, Marshall: the towering damage sponge, and Hugo: the dexterous and strategic fighter. However, there will be many more fighters and maps added in the future!

Keep in mind that this project was made for fun and nothing more.

Instagram: @crosbrawl_arena

DISCLAIMER: This game is not online. You need two people to play this game.
